Text: Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Cc It has been formed Enron Investment Services Ltd was set up on Regards Mahesh Janine Juggins To Sara CT Mahesh CT cc Paul CT John CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Mahesh please can you update Sara on the status I think it has been formed but Mahesh will confirm Regards Janine From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Janine CT Paul CT cc John CT Subject UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Any word yet on creation of the new entity Sara

Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments IncCan you provide this to Sara please Thx Mahesh From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Mahesh CT cc Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc thanks Can you provide me with the appropriate signature block for ENAECT Investments Inc through the agent Mahesh Lakhani AM To Sara CT cc Paul CT John CT Janine JugginsLONECT Cindy CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Sara It has been formed Enron Investment Services Ltd was set up on Regards Mahesh Janine Juggins To Sara CT Mahesh CT cc Paul CT John CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Mahesh please can you update Sara on the status I think it has been formed but Mahesh will confirm Regards Janine From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Janine CT Paul CT cc John CT Subject UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Any word yet on creation of the new entity Sara

Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Cc Apologies I have been out of the office for the past days I had asked Cindy in legal to provide you with signature blocks when you first asked for it I will chase her again today I will call you this afternoon to discuss the status of the agency agreement and any other requirement that you may have let me know when you are available Regards Mahesh From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Mahesh CT Cindy CT Janine CT cc John CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc I am still waiting for a copy of the services agreement and the form of signature Instinet is proceeding but will still require this information Thanks Sara Sara Shackleton PM To Mahesh LakhaniLONECT Cindy BuckleyLONECT cc Janine CT John CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc I have not received a response from anyone Sara Mahesh Lakhani AM To Sara CT Cindy CT cc Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Cindy Can you provide this to Sara please Thx Mahesh From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Mahesh CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc thanks Can you provide me with the appropriate signature block for ENAECT Investments Inc through the agent Mahesh Lakhani AM To Sara CT cc Paul CT John CT Janine JugginsLONECT Cindy CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Sara It has been formed Enron Investment Services Ltd was set up on Regards Mahesh Janine Juggins To Sara CT Mahesh CT cc Paul CT John CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Mahesh please can you update Sara on the status I think it has been formed but Mahesh will confirm Regards Janine From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Janine CT Paul CT cc John CT Subject UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Any word yet on creation of the new entity Sara

Entities changes Forwarded by Mahesh LakhaniLONECT on Mahesh Lakhani To Cindy CT cc Erica GutLONECT Subject Entities changes As discussed Please change the name of Enron Investment Services Limited to Enron Credit Resources Limited Please process this as soon as possible and advise me as soon as possible Once the above name change has occurred please set up a new entity called Enron Investment Services Limited The details for the new set up are exactly the same as before The only difference is that the parent will be ECT Investments Inc Regards Mahesh

Re Enron Investment Services Limited Cc Sheila Shane is one of the directors of EISL Regards Mahesh From Sheila Glover To Sara CT Mahesh CT Janine CT cc John CT Shane CT Subject Re Enron Investment Services Limited Sara Mahesh and Janine I suggested to John that if someone needs to sign the EISL agreement for Instinet that Shane Dallmann could sign Gary had suggested that Shane be one of the directors for EISL Thanks Sheila Forwarded by Sheila GloverHOUECT on AM John Greene AM To Sara CT cc Sheila CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc Sara What is the status on this I really need to get this issue resolved as soon as possible as this application is a key part of my ability to begin trading in Europe Thanks and regards John From Sara Shackleton on CDT To Mahesh CT Cindy CT Janine CT cc John CT Subject Re UK arranger for ENA and ECT Investments Inc I am still waiting for a copy of the services agreement and the form of signature Instinet is proceeding but will Enron Investment Services Limited STATUS Cc status of the issues for EISL are Set up of the legal entity under ECT Investments Inc This is being done by Sue Kelly as we speak Sue expects the entity to be incorporated by the end of this week Sue Please ensure that Shane Dallman is one of the directors of EISL Agency agreement The revised agreement is attached below I am waiting for comments from Paul Simons in London Legal Any other comments then please let me know as soon as possible I am aiming to execute the agreement this week as soon as the new EISL is incorporated If there are any other outstanding issues then please let me know Please call me on if you have any questions Regards Mahesh

Enron Investment Services Limited STATUS Cc status of the issues for EISL are The new EISL has now been set up under under ECT Investments Inc Details as follows Date of incorporation August Company Number Directors Mark Evans November Michael Brown November Shane Dallmann November James Derrick November John Sherriff November Paul Chivers November Fernley Dyson November Secretary Sue Kelly November Agency agreement I now have comments on the agency agreement from everyone which have been incorporated in the FINAL draft below Please let me know as soon as possible if you have any comments Otherwise I will execute the agreement on Wednesday If there are any other outstanding issues then please let me know Please call me on if you have any questions Regards Mahesh
